description: This source file implements two main functions for a server component in the SLAP architecture: SlapBmc2SrvoExecute, which executes a specified page and then returns control to the calling page, and SlapBmc2SrvoTransfer, which transfers control to another page without resuming the original. The functions interact with a request controller object and manage parameter lists for control commands.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SlapBmc2SrvoExecute(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,char * page_path)
methods.description: Executes a specified user page, passing control to it, and then returns control after execution.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SlapBmc2SrvoTransfer(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,char * page_path)
methods.description: Transfers control to a specified page, ending the current session context, without resuming the original page.
